system.description:
Requirements: you must have mastered the Ace of Cards Class.

When you discard cards due to the Magic Cards Skill, you may choose 1 of them and place it face down in front of you as a vanguard card instead of putting it into your discard pile. You may only do so if you have two or fewer vanguard cards in play.

When a source deals damage to you and/or one or more allies you can see, you may reveal one of your vanguard cards in play. If you do and that card is a joker or its suit matches the damage type dealt by that source, you and every ally you can see gain Resistance to that damage type until the end of the current turn; then, put the revealed vanguard card on top of your discard pile, and it stops being a vanguard card.

You may look at your vanguard cards at any time. At the end of each conflict, if you have one or more vanguard cards in play, shuffle them back into your deck.

You & Allies Receive: @EFFECT[Compendium.projectfu.heroic-skills.Item.yiXDxlkj7bhQyRyt], @EFFECT[Compendium.projectfu.heroic-skills.Item.WXh8k8YTJeGtdzLg], @EFFECT[Compendium.projectfu.heroic-skills.Item.rb2CVOWvXQDOvUVw], or @EFFECT[Compendium.projectfu.heroic-skills.Item.CeJ6JpsXwWRUDz1k]
